inscription:
Inscription

LRC on mount, in pencil: [Verdier / (formerly Rubens' circle)]
medium: Black and white chalk on gray paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, June 22, 1982, no. 29, as French c. 1800, to Fitzgerald; [Shanaugh Fitzgerald, London, 1982-84; sold July 7, as 17th-century Flemish, for £450, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1984-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Male Figure Running
